item.title: NXT
item.description: score:306 Chances: Nextracker (NXT) has beaten earnings expectations and lifted guidance, showing robust performance and product differentiation in the solar market. Increasing installation activities and benefits from the Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) should benefit the U.S. solar industry amid declining module pricing. Apple, Amazon.
